__e: All right, Edith and I were so successful for so long because we kept it just small enough.
When this fellow arrives, it would be nice if you could leave Edith and me to see him on our own.
I don't think that of Mary or Edith or you.
It's just, as much as I loved it, Edith, I want more than that.
Edith, I know we haven't always got along, and I doubt things'll change much in the future, but today I wish you all the luck in the world.
Well, don't worry about Christopher, it was only pneumonia, and not at the Front.
